LocationQueries.Locations: SELECT VersionID as VersionID, SignalId as SignalId, PrimaryName, SecondaryName, 1 as LocationType, Enabled, JurisdictionId, ISNULL(TRY_CONVERT(float, Latitude),0) as Latitude, ISNULL(TRY_CONVERT(float, Longitude),0) as Longitude, Pedsare1to1,  RegionId,  Start, VersionActionId, 1 as LocationTypeId FROM [moe].dbo.Signals
LocationQueries.SpeedDevices: Select 'Active' as Status, s.[SignalID], '127.0.0.1'as IPAddress, [Enabled], 3 AS DeviceStatus,  1 AS LoggingEnabled, 6 as DeviceType, (SELECT TOP 1 c.VersionID FROM [MOE].[dbo].[Signals] c WHERE c.SignalID = s.SignalID AND c.VersionActionId <> 3 ORDER BY [Start] DESC) AS LocationId FROM [Signals] s Join [dbo].[Approaches] a on s.VersionID = a.VersionID Join [dbo].[Detectors] d on a.ApproachID = d.ApproachID Join [dbo].[DetectionTypeDetector] dtd on d.ID = dtd.ID WHERE TRY_CAST(Latitude AS FLOAT) != 0.0 And dtd.DetectionTypeID = 3 And s.VersionActionId <> 3  group by s.SignalID, IPAddress,[Enabled]
LocationQueries.Approaches: Select a.ApproachID as ApproachID, a.VersionId as VersionID, a.DirectionTypeID, a.Description, a.MPH, a.ProtectedPhaseNumber, a.IsProtectedPhaseOverlap, a.PermissivePhaseNumber, a.IsPermissivePhaseOverlap, a.PedestrianPhaseNumber, a.IsPedestrianPhaseOverlap, a.PedestrianDetectors from Approaches a join Signals s on s.VersionID = a.VersionID  WHERE TRY_CAST(Latitude AS FLOAT) != 0.0
LocationQueries.Detectors: SELECT d.[ID] as ID,d.[DetectorID],d.[DetChannel],d.[DistanceFromStopBar],d.[MinSpeedFilter],d.[DateAdded],d.[DateDisabled],d.[LaneNumber],COALESCE(d.[MovementTypeID], 6) AS MovementTypeID,COALESCE(d.[LaneTypeID], 1) AS LaneTypeID,d.[DecisionPoint],d.[MovementDelay],d.[ApproachID] as ApproachID,d.[DetectionHardwareID],d.[LatencyCorrection] FROM [MOE].[dbo].[Detectors] d Join Approaches a on d.ApproachID = a.ApproachID Join Signals s on a.VersionID = s.VersionID WHERE TRY_CAST(Latitude AS FLOAT) != 0.0 and MovementTypeID is not null
LocationQueries.Devices: SELECT Enabled, 3 AS DeviceStatus, 1 AS LoggingEnabled, 1 AS DeviceType, SignalId AS Note, (SELECT TOP 1 c.ControllerTypeID FROM [MOE].[dbo].[Signals] c WHERE c.SignalID = s.SignalID AND c.VersionActionId <> 3 ORDER BY [Start] DESC) AS ControllerTypeId, (SELECT TOP 1 c.IPAddress FROM [MOE].[dbo].[Signals] c WHERE c.SignalID = s.SignalID AND c.VersionActionId <> 3 ORDER BY [Start] DESC) as Ipaddress, (SELECT TOP 1 c.VersionID FROM [MOE].[dbo].[Signals] c WHERE c.SignalID = s.SignalID AND c.VersionActionId <> 3 ORDER BY [Start] DESC) AS LocationId, (SELECT TOP 1 c.SignalID FROM [MOE].[dbo].[Signals] c WHERE c.SignalID = s.SignalID AND c.VersionActionId <> 3 ORDER BY [Start] DESC) AS DeviceIdentifier FROM [MOE].dbo.Signals s WHERE s.VersionActionId <>3 GROUP BY SignalId, Enabled
LocationQueries.RouteLocations: SELECT r.[Id], [RouteId], [Order], SignalID as LocationIdentifier  ,(SELECT [Phase]  FROM [MOE].[dbo].[RoutePhaseDirections]  where IsPrimaryApproach = 1  and RouteSignalId = r.Id) as PrimaryPhase  ,(SELECT DirectionTypeId  FROM [MOE].[dbo].[RoutePhaseDirections]  where IsPrimaryApproach = 1  and RouteSignalId = r.Id) as PrimaryDirectionId   ,(SELECT IsOverlap  FROM [MOE].[dbo].[RoutePhaseDirections]  where IsPrimaryApproach = 1  and RouteSignalId = r.Id) as IsPrimaryOverlap  ,(SELECT [Phase]  FROM [MOE].[dbo].[RoutePhaseDirections]  where IsPrimaryApproach = 0  and RouteSignalId = r.Id) as OpposingPhase  ,(SELECT DirectionTypeId  FROM [MOE].[dbo].[RoutePhaseDirections]  where IsPrimaryApproach = 0  and RouteSignalId = r.Id) as OpposingDirectionId  ,(SELECT IsOverlap  FROM [MOE].[dbo].[RoutePhaseDirections]  where IsPrimaryApproach = 0  and RouteSignalId = r.Id) as IsOpposingOverlap  FROM [MOE].[dbo].[RouteSignals] r  Where (SELECT [Phase]  FROM [MOE].[dbo].[RoutePhaseDirections]  where IsPrimaryApproach = 1  and RouteSignalId = r.Id) Is Not NULL And (SELECT [Phase]  FROM [MOE].[dbo].[RoutePhaseDirections]  where IsPrimaryApproach = 0  and RouteSignalId = r.Id) Is Not NULL
LocationQueries.Products: SELECT [ControllerTypeID], CASE WHEN [Description] LIKE 'ASC3%' THEN 'Econolite' WHEN [Description] = 'Cobalt' THEN 'QFree' WHEN [Description] = 'MaxTime' THEN 'QFree'  WHEN [Description] = 'Trafficware' THEN 'Trafficware'  WHEN [Description] = 'Siemens SEPAC' THEN 'Siemens'  WHEN [Description] = 'McCain ATC EX' THEN 'McCain'  WHEN [Description] = 'Peek' THEN 'Peek'  WHEN [Description] = 'EOS' THEN 'Econolite' ELSE [Description] END AS Manufacturer, CASE WHEN [Description] LIKE 'ASC3 - 2070' THEN '2070'  WHEN [Description] = 'Siemens SEPAC' THEN 'SEPAC'  WHEN [Description] = 'McCain ATC EX' THEN 'ATC EX' WHEN [Description] = 'ASC3-32.68.40' THEN '32.68.40' ELSE [Description] END AS Model, [Description] FROM [MOE].[dbo].[ControllerTypes];
LocationQueries.DeviceConfigurations: SELECT [ControllerTypeID], [ControllerTypeID] AS ProductId, [Description], CASE WHEN [Description] = 'MaxTime' THEN 4 ELSE 2 END AS Protocol, CASE WHEN [Description] = 'MaxTime' THEN 80 ELSE 22 END AS Port, CASE WHEN [Description] = 'MaxTime' THEN 'v1/asclog/xml/full' ELSE FTPDirectory END AS Path, CASE WHEN [Description] = 'MaxTime' THEN '["?since={LogStartTime:MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss.f}"]' ELSE '["dat","datZ"]' END AS Query, CASE WHEN [Description] = 'MaxTime' THEN '["MaxtimeToIndianaDecoder"]' ELSE '["AscToIndianaDecoder"]' END AS Decoders, CASE WHEN [Description] = 'MaxTime' THEN '' ELSE null END AS ConnectionProperties, CASE WHEN [Description] = 'MaxTime' THEN 60 ELSE 0 END AS LoggingOffset, [UserName], [Password] FROM [MOE].[dbo].[ControllerTypes];
